alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN AND NORTHWESTERN MARATHON COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dorchester, or 10 miles south of Medford, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lincoln and northwestern Marathon Counties, including the following locations... Edgar, Milan, Cherokee, Unity, Little Chicago, Marathon City, Hamburg, Poniatowski, Athens, and Rib Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
